name: Minimal Tabs for jQuery
body:
##How to use? - In `$(document).ready(function(){});` section; - Put `$.minimalTabs();` code; - You can add `$("#tab_1").click();` to start with a tab clicked; - Stylize the CSS with your preferences; - Done! ##Features: - Very easy to use! Too light to load (only 5 KB, this plugin and your style together) - Supports keyboard navigation (using the "tab" and then "enter" on the desired tab) ##Install: ```html ``` ##The code: ```html ``` ##The html: ```html
